message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. It's a great price, considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to my business.
